reuters.title: WINNEBAGO INDUSTRIES INC <WGO> 2ND QTR NET
reuters.body: Period ended February 28 Shr 25 cts vs 25 cts Net 6,292,000 vs 6,340,000 Sales 97.0 mln vs 87.0 mln Six mths Shr 36 cts vs 28 cts Net 9,122,000 vs 7,053,000 Sales 193.2 mln vs 168.6 mln NOTE: 1986 period ended March One Reuter 
